license.comments:
This is a fork of https://github.com/String-Latin/DIN-91379-Characters-and-Sequences from Volker Kunert (https://github.com/vk-github18).
The license applies to this Maven artifact, its modules and other content within the GIT repository specified in the scm section of this file. The copyright years are given by the inceptionYear tag within this file and by the history of the GIT repository as well as the original repository at https://github.com/String-Latin/DIN-91379-Characters-and-Sequences. The inceptionYear refers to the fork.
